NEWS
=======

## 0.0.0 - 2023-04-13 <a id='0.0.0'></a>

Initial release of tomcli, a CLI tool for working with TOML files.
Pronounced "tohm-clee."
Currently, tomcli only provides ` tomcli-get` command but more are planned!
